<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<U>
	About ParkerVision
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	ParkerVision, Inc. designs, develops and markets its proprietary radio-frequency (RF) technologies that enable advanced wireless solutions for current and next generation communications networks. Protected by a highly-regarded, worldwide patent portfolio, the Company&#8217;s solutions for wireless transfer of RF waveforms address the needs of a broad range of wirelessly connected devices for high levels of RF performance coupled with best-in-class power consumption. For more information please visit
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	www.parkervision.com
</FONT>
	.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	(PRKR-I)
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TABLE ID="8D7872AE9FDF4AFC8E55908C0E93E97F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s&#160; most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth quarter in the case of an annual report)&#160; that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<TABLE ID="DE310B2303084473987890E9E25FA774" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 13.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons fulfilling the equivalent functions):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<TABLE ID="85162CC03A6542B2AF08FAF105608189" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<TABLE ID="D9250A87E47E4C9783B2C08232E392E0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>

	EXHIBIT 32.1

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	SECTION 906 CERTIFICATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	In connection with the Annual Report of ParkerVision, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) on Form 10-K, for the period ended December 31, 2015 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Report&#8221;), each of the undersigned, in the capacities and on the dates indicated below, hereby certifies pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<TABLE ID="ACCCB1D6920348439E7A945542FC7828" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 22.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
<TABLE ID="032F1485AF2842AEB27EC674DDF798C8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 22.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operation of the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.15">
	&#160;
</DIV>
